results.title: Metformin alleviates osteoarthritis in mice by inhibiting chondrocyte ferroptosis and improving subchondral osteosclerosis and angiogenesis
results.text_hl: These findings were verified in the present study, demonstrating that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ alleviated the @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001845 @@@sclerosis of subchondral bone@@@ in advanced stages of @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ and inhibited the angiogenesis of abnormal subchondral bone.

citations.NLM: Yan J, Feng G, Ma L, Chen Z, Jin Q. Metformin alleviates osteoarthritis in mice by inhibiting chondrocyte ferroptosis and improving subchondral osteosclerosis and angiogenesis J Orthop Surg Res. 2022 Jun 28;17(1):333. PMID: 35765024
